name: Mutiny!!
description:
Mutiny!! is set in a world of fantasy, and adventure. A realm where airships can sail among the clouds as well as the sea, entering the flogiston to journey to other planes. There’s treasure spread out over many planes if you’re brave or curious enough to find it!

Key Game Features

• 11 unique girls to encounter
• A long, sprawling campaign story comprises the main game
• 2 free additionally character side-stories are included with the game, with more adventures and side-stories to come after launch!
• 12 different locations
• Puzzle-solving mini-games, and ship combat
• Monster Girl romance
• Different social options shape your relationships and ending
• Visual Novel style interactions
• Charming music and sexy, glamorous art
• DRM Free
• Windows, Mac, and Linux
